attributes.action: Withdraw UK Membership from the EU.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The EU, is suffacting our democrating rights, making decisions on our behalf which often don't benifit our country as a whole. The EU is corrupt.

rejection.details: There is a similar petition at http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/JoinEFTA/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
